content.subtitle: B. Non-Personal Information
items: Your interactions with the website (pages visited, time spent, etc.)

content.text: We use your personal information for the following purposes:

items: To process and fulfill your orders
To communicate with you (order status, offers, customer service)
To improve our website, products, and services
To prevent fraud and ensure security

content.text: We do not sell or rent your personal data to third parties. We may share your information with:

items: Service providers (e.g., delivery partners, payment processors, marketing agencies)
Government or regulatory authorities, when required by law or in response to a legal process
Third-party tools integrated into our site (such as analytics or advertising partners), under strict data protection agreements

content.text: We maintain reasonable and appropriate security measures to protect your personal data, including:
However, no internet-based platform is entirely secure. You are responsible for keeping your login credentials confidential.

items: Access, correct, or update your personal information via your account settings
Request deletion of your account or data (subject to legal requirements)

content.text: To make such requests, please contact us at info@totalneedsmarketing.com.
We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze traffic, and provide personalized recommendations. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings.

Our Website may contain links to other websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third-party websites. Please read their privacy policies before submitting any personal data.
Our Website is not intended for children under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes by posting the updated policy on our Website with a new effective date.
For any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
